title: Martin Bloomberg Joins Leageez as VP of Marketing
text: Martin Bloomberg Joins Leageez as VP of Marketing David Saad to focus on national sports retail allliances. SEEKONK, MA, October 16, 2015 /24-7PressRelease/ -- Leageez announced today that Mr. Martin Bloomberg has been named Vice President of Marketing. Mr. Bloomberg will be replacing Leageez founder and President, David Saad. Mr. Saad will focus on national sports alliances. Mr. Bloomberg is a graduate of Cornell University. He has managed multi-channel sales forces in the garment and footwear industries and was president of a subsidiary of Wolverine World Wide. In 1998 Mr. Bloomberg worked in business development for Hi Tech Professionals, a company heavily involved in the development for Systems Online, a developer of digital parts catalogues until 2004. Mr. Bloomberg is also the founder and CEO of Thermobind.com, a leading distributor of B2B presentation materials and equipment. "Leageez has gone through two years of testing with sports leagues throughout the US and Canada," said founder David Saad. "Mr. Bloomberg brings a wealth of experience in digital marketing, as well as traditional marketing." Simply put we're lucky and excited about Leageez' next chapter, which Martin will help drive." Leageez hopes to announce a CTO within the next two weeks.About LeageezLeageez is a sports league administration platform and mobile app. It provides leagues, from College to Little League with: A website, a Scheduler for games and officials, Team Pages, Player Pages, Statistics, Online Registration, News Center, Communications Center, Fund Raising, Sell Thru, On Line Advertising, Social Media and much more. # # #
